mapper.select: select id, project_id, create_time, update_time, is_deleted, spring_bean_name, class_name, method_name from lv_invoke_spring_task where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into lv_invoke_spring_task(project_id, create_time, update_time, is_deleted, spring_bean_name, class_name, method_name) values (#{projectId}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{isDeleted}, #{springBeanName}, #{classNameDo}, #{methodName})

insert into lv_invoke_spring_task(project_id, create_time, update_time, is_deleted, spring_bean_name, class_name, method_name) values
(#{entity.projectId}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateTime}, #{entity.isDeleted}, #{entity.springBeanName}, #{entity.classNameDo}, #{entity.methodName})

insert into lv_invoke_spring_task(project_id, create_time, update_time, is_deleted, spring_bean_name, class_name, method_name) values
(#{entity.projectId}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateTime}, #{entity.isDeleted}, #{entity.springBeanName}, #{entity.classNameDo}, #{entity.methodName})
on duplicate key update project_id = values(project_id), create_time = values(create_time), update_time = values(update_time), is_deleted = values(is_deleted), spring_bean_name = values(spring_bean_name), class_name = values(class_name), method_name = values(method_name)
mapper.update:
update lv_invoke_spring_task
project_id = #{projectId},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
is_deleted = #{isDeleted},
spring_bean_name = #{springBeanName},
class_name = #{classNameDo},
method_name = #{methodName},
where id = #{id}
